content: loosely bobble all sts in pattern turn the heel sample was bobble using jeny s surprisingly you will be working back and forth on the bn stretchy bind off only the stitches on the tn will not be worked http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php until you have completed the heel decreases weave in ends block and enjoy place a marker at the centre of the bn 27 29 31 on either side k to 2 sts beyond the marker ssk k1 turn pull the yarn tight © 2019 yarn twisters 3 swirl socks
